Intervention: The DBT was read independently by two radiologists and a consensus meeting decided to remember the woman or not.
Women selected for subsequent assessment (positive screening) were recalled.
Tomosynthesis digital breast + synthetic mammography: Two-vision tomosynthesis performed with GE SenoClaire 3D breast tomosynthesis.
The digital mammograms were read independently by two radiologists. A consensus meeting decided to remember the woman or not.
Women selected for subsequent assessment (positive screening) were recalled.
Digital mammography: two-view digital mammography made with the GE SenoClaire 3D breast tomography.
Results: Performance measures:
Number of participants with breast cancer determined by the screen
Comparison of breast cancer rates detected by screening in tomosynthesis with numerical mammography, as conducted through a population-based screening program.
Time limit: 36 months from the start of the trial
Results 1:
Title of the arm/group: Digital breast tomosynthesis
Description of the arm/group: Digital breast synthesis + synthetic mammography (DBT)
The DBT was read independently by two radiologists and a consensus meeting decided to remember the woman or not.
Women selected for subsequent assessment (positive screening) were recalled.
Tomosynthesis digital breast + synthetic mammography: Two-vision tomosynthesis performed with GE SenoClaire 3D breast tomosynthesis.
Total number of participants analysed: 14380
Type of measure: Number of participants
Unit of measure: Participants 95 0.7%
Results 2:
Title of the arm/group: Digital mammography
Description of the Arm/Group: Digital mammograms were read independently by two radiologists. A consensus meeting decided to remember the woman or not.
Women selected for subsequent assessment (positive screening) were recalled.
Digital mammography: two-view digital mammography made with the GE SenoClaire 3D breast tomography.
Total number of participants analysed: 14369
Type of measure: Number of participants
Unit of measure: Participants 87 0.6%
